text.autoconfig.sfcr.title: SuperFancyClouds: Refabricated
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.enableFog.@T: Use fog to transition cloud to view boundary.
The distance from fog to player. Higher and farther.
Height of the cloud on the Y-axis. May NOT accurate.
It will invalid when other mod which modify cloud height are installed (such as Sodium-Extra).
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudLayerTh: §o§4- - Following option may cause weird issue if set too high - -§r
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.cloudRenderD: Cloud Render Distance Fit to View
